subject: Fix multi-model comparison and mobile responsiveness
body:
- Fix models returning all zeros by namespacing input field IDs
  - Input fields now use {modelKey}-{inputName} format
  - Prevents ID conflicts when multiple models are selected
  - All model forms kept in DOM (hidden/shown) instead of destroyed

- Fix calculate & compare button for multiple models
  - Updated calculateModel() to use namespaced input IDs
  - Updated gatherInputs() to use namespaced input IDs
  - Forms now persist in DOM so all model inputs are accessible

- Fix mobile metrics card layout
  - Changed from grid-cols-2 to grid-cols-1 on mobile
  - Cards now stack vertically on small screens
  - Responsive: 1 col (mobile) -> 2 cols (tablet) -> 4 cols (desktop)
